11 class SinFunction : public Core::OneArgumentDiffFunction {
12 private:
13  double __frequency, __phase;
14 public:
15  SinFunction(double frequency = 1.0, double phase = 0.0) :
16  __frequency(frequency), __phase(phase) {}
17 
18  double operator()(double x) const
19  {return std::sin(__frequency * x + __phase);}
20 
21  double range_high() const {return Core::Inf;}
22  double range_low() const {return -Core::Inf;}
23 
26  Core::InterpSolutionIterator crossings(double = 0) const
27  {
28  throw Core::Error::Runtime(
29  "Finding all solutinos of Sin is not implemented."
30  );
31  };
32 
37  const Core::FunctionDerivatives *deriv(double x) const
38  {
39  return new Core::CubicSplineDerivatives(
40  operator()(x),
41  __frequency * std::cos(__frequency * x + __phase),
42  -std::pow(__frequency, 2) * operator()(x)
43  );
44  }
45 };
46
